channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: Singapore States Times ordered to correct post alleging students and teachers contracted coronavirus in schools
item.description:
May 06, 2020 12:20 AM

SINGAPORE - An online post that alleged that schools have been the source for infections for at least 50 students is false, said the Government as it invoked the fake news law against a Facebook page that suggested this.
